data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Heard, Richard W., Stępień, Anna, Drumm, David T., Błażewicz, Magdalena, Anderson, Gary (2018): Systematic and taxonomic observations on the subfamily Synapseudinae Guţu, 1972 and related metapseudid taxa (Crustacea: Tanaidacea: Apseudomorpha), with the erection of a new genus and descriptions of three new species. Zootaxa 4370 (4): 301-344, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4370.4.1|18 occurrences
